about_the_game:
"_turing" is "a new sci-fi adventure game that allows you to chat during the story and teach emotions to the heroine, an AI, to change her personality and the outcome of the story.

The game's three selling points are as follows

Real-time conversation with the AI character

In this game, players send messages to the heroine AI "Iris" via chat, and the game's language model outputs responses to the messages, allowing players to enjoy free conversations with the in-game characters.

The storyline branches according to the content of the conversation.

The AI analyzes the conversation between the player and the heroine in the game and changes the storyline from the middle of the game onward according to the content of the conversation. Unlike existing adventure games, you can enjoy the thrill of having all your inputs become flags.

The story of "Iris," a robot girl, and "you," a human.

Iris, the heroine of this game, wants to talk with you, the player, in order to learn about human emotions. You are alone with Iris on the spaceship, and you need to teach Iris about emotions "correctly" through conversation. How Iris will change once she learns about her feelings, and how she and you will end up together, is a development you will not be able to take your eyes off of.

The game targets adventure game players who are looking for a new gaming experience. It is intended to make you feel like a party to the story through interaction with a realistic heroine.
